entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
